original_text: But shall we say, ‘From man’?”—they were afraid of the people, for they all held that John really was a prophet.
korean_text: 그러면 사람으로부터라 할까 하였으나 모든 사람이 요한을 참 선지자로 여기므로 그들이 백성을 두려워하는지라

sentences.original_text: they were afraid of the people,
for they all held that John really was a prophet.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 모두 요한이 참으로 선지자라고 믿었기 때문입니다.
